Package edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.bench

Class TestSuite

java.lang.Object
edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.bench.TestSuite
public class TestSuite extends Object
Each test in a test suite represents one run of one planner on one benchmark problem; the suite coordinates some number of threads to run tests in parallel.
Author:
Stephen G. Ware

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    TestSuite.Runner
    A thread for running tests in parallel that is coordinated by a test suite.

    A test represents one run of one planner on one benchmark problem.

    • TestSuite

      public TestSuite(List<Benchmark> problems, List<edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.prog.ProgressionPlanner> planners, Report report)
      Constructs a new test suite which will run each planner on each benchmark problem some number of times in parallel.
      Parameters:
      problems - the benchmark problems to test
      planners - the planner to test on each problem
      report - the report to update as tests complete

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run(edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.util.Worker.Status status) throws InterruptedException
      Runs all tests in parallel, printing updates as tests start and finish.
      Parameters:
      status - a status object to update as tests complete
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if one of the threads running tests is interrupted
